title: TWO MONTHS FREE**WATER VIEW**NET RENT AMORTIZED**
posting_body: ['TWO MONTHS FREE**WATER VIEW**NET RENT AMORTIZED**', 'Listing ID #: 212929', 'Price: $3,099', 'Property Type: Apartment', 'Bedrooms: Studio', 'Bathrooms: 1.0', 'Building Amenities', 'Concierge', 'Doorman', 'Elevator', 'Garage', 'Health Club', 'Laundry', 'Roof Deck', 'Subway', 'Valet', 'Apartment Amenities', 'City View', 'Dishwasher', 'Granite Kitchen', 'High Ceilings', 'Marble Bath', 'Renovated', 'Water view one of the kind recently renovated Studio flex one bedroom if needed includes one-bathroom with North Eastern View.', 'High ceilings, oak flooring, oversized doors and windows.', 'Building and Amenities Luxuriously appointed in every way, redefines full-service living.', 'Courteous staff is available for you twenty-four hours a day, seven days a week and a host of on-premise amenities offer a unique level of comfort and convenience.', 'Amenities include a magnificent style lobby, fully equipped fitness center, large outdoor plaza, private laundry on every floor, storage facilities and complimentary WiFi in lobby.', 'CONTACT MARCO TO SCHEDULE A PRIVATE VIEWING EMAIL ME', 'AT <URL> CALL AT 917-353-3448 TEXT FOR FASTER RESPONSE', 'Marco Bianchi', 'Phone: 9173533448', 'Mobile: 9173533448', 'Email: <URL>', 'The Bouklis Group \xa0 9173533448 \xa0 9173533448 \xa0 <URL>', 'POSTED BY REALTYMX™', 'To view, call or text Marco Bianchi at 9173533448']
